---

## :books: Features

* Markdown sourcing
* Estimated reading time for each post
* Styled components
* Nunito font
* Textmarkerstyle headings
* Plugins for offline support

## :clipboard: Tech Stack 

- Hosted on Netlify
- styled-components for styling
- ESLint & Prettier for linting
